title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Nissan Navara 2015 D23 NP300 ST 2.3L – ProVent Oil Catch Can Dual Bracket Kit OS-PROV-17B

content.rendered:
MANN+HUMMEL’s ProVent 200 Kit suits:

Nissan Navara 2.3L ST NP300 (apr2015 on)

Turbo Diesel D23 YS23 DOHC Di 16V

 

** KIT INCLUDES a 2-on-1 bracket

Designed to hold both a Provent & Pre-Filter

Optional Donaldson Pre Filter Fuel Separator Kit >

Optional Fuel Manager Pre Filter Fuel Separator Kit >

MANN+HUMMEL’s ProVent Catch Can

ProVent is the newest innovation for crankcase ventilation. Also known as a Catch Can, it is specifically designed to accommodate the latest generation of turbo-charged engines and has the following advantages over existing solutions.

• Highly efficient oil separation providing ideal protection for the turbocharger and other components installed downstream

• Low pressure loss • Less motor oil consumption in comparison to less efficient separators or conventional open systems

• Maintenance friendly: fittings are not removed during element maintenance • Universal usage: exceptional for variable flow rates

• Integrated safety feature against irregularly high crankcase pressure • Compact design • Light and robust design

• No electrical energy required • Low running costs

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit

:: Stainless Steel Bracket

:: Top & Bottom Hoses

:: Drain Kit

Some applications hoses may need to be trimmed, drain hose trim to your preference length !

Download PDF Installation Instructions >

Click to view individual replacement parts

Mann Provent 200 Fitting Accessories >
